creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: cream colored with fringe on one short side; geometric patterns along long sides in orange, white, blue and green; three stripes with geometric designs at short sides.  Surface ornamentation (Needlework)
medium: Wool, cotton, silk; plain weave with supplementary weft patterning
title: Veil
